mapper.insert: insert into qna(q_subject, q_content, q_writer, q_regdate, q_ip) values(#{q_subject},#{q_content},#{q_writer},now(), #{q_ip})
mapper.select: select * from qna order by q_no desc limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
mapper.update: update qna set q_subject=#{q_subject}, q_content=#{q_content} where q_no=#{q_no}
